Hand of the Emperor: Start of the movement phase, add 3"
Spirit of the Martyr: Start of movement phase, 1 model regains D3 wounds or one returns from dead
Aegis of the Emperor: Start of the opponents psychic phase, ignore mortal wounds on 4+
Divine Guidance: Start of the shooting phase, +1 to hit rolls
The Passion: Start of the fight phase, fight twice
Light of the Emperor: Start of the moral phase, unit auto-passes
